creditline: Given in memory of Ted Hartwell in gratitude for decades of friendship, and also in appreciation of the friendship of his son, Joe Hartwell
description: large tree at left in the country, overhanging a dirt road; white fences at left and right; fields at left and right
marks:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription and Stamp

s on back at bottom edge, in black ink: [TREE, FARM
title: Tree, Farm Road, Highway 22, Northeast of Rushville, Fairfield Co., Ohio
